title: Transactions
description: Group multiple operations into atomic units - all succeed or all fail.
example:
-- Transaction with error handling (in application)
-- Python example
conn.begin()
try:
    cursor.execute("UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 100 WHERE id = %s", (1,))
    cursor.execute("UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance + 100 WHERE id = %s", (2,))
    conn.commit()
except Exception as e:
    conn.rollback()
    raise e

-- Isolation levels
BEGIN TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL SERIALIZABLE;
-- Your queries
COMMIT;
useCase: Data consistency, banking operations, multi-step processes, preventing partial updates
